¿Olvidaste tu contraseña? Ningún problem: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

Ha habilitado la autenticación de dos fa: You have enabled two factor authentication.
No ha habilitado la autenticación de dos: You have not enabled two-factor authentication.
Cuando la autenticación de dos factores: When two-factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure random token during authentication. You can retrieve this token from the Google Authenticator app on your phone.
Para finalizar la habilitación de la aut: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phones authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
La autenticación de dos factores ahora e: Two factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phones authenticator application or enter the setup key.
Almacene estos códigos de recuperación e: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.
Administre y cierre la sesión de sus ses: Manage and log out of your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
Si es necesario, puede cerrar sesión en: If necessary, you can log out of all other sessions of your browser on all your devices.
